item.title: A Look Back
item.description: Since I just graduated college with a B.S. in software engineering, I think it’s a good time to look back. The Early Years # As a kid, some of my first exposure to computers was the computers the school had that we were sometimes allowed to play with after school. They had a few games on them, mostly edutainment games designed to help kids learn arithmetic, practice reading, and things like that.
